UnsupportedBrowser.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Braytech requires modern browser features in order to operate. The minumum browser requirements are set to allow browsers that are well over a year old to run Braytech. As such, if you encounter this message, it's time to move on to something new.

A Chromium-based browser such as Microsoft Edge is recommended.@className=warning@
UnsupportedBrowser.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Unsupported Browser

Data.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Delete the authentication data stored on your device. While unnecessary, this function is provided for your peace of mind.

NoAuth.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Some features of Braytech require your written permission to activate, generally to protect your privacy.

To use this feature, please tell Bungie that you approve. No personal information is shared by doing soâ€”only an authentication code with which you may interact with more API endpoints.
NoAuth.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Authentication Required

DiffProfile.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ You are not authorised to access a different user's profile data, but you may use these helpful links to return to your own.

You can find more information regarding your authentication in the _Settings_ view.
DiffProfile.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Oh, honey... Honnnnneyyyy

Friends.Text: ğŸ¦˜ Authenticate with Bungie.net to see your Bungie friends list here! It's a handy shortcut to see who's on and to check each other's profiles!

Memberships.Description: ğŸ¦˜ These are the memberships that are currently associated with your Bungie.net profile.

Auth.SubscriptionFeature: ğŸ¦˜ This is a subscription feature. Some features are made possible only with subscriber support. [Learn more](/settings/subscriptions)

Suggestion.Subtle: ğŸ¦˜ Login with Bungie.net to unlock more features.
Suggestion.Text: ğŸ¦˜ Most of Braytech's features are available to all users and depend on publically available data, but some of Destiny's features require more explicit access permissions which you can grant to Braytech by authenticating with Bungie.net.

Character.DiffProfile: ğŸ¦˜ You're viewing someone else's profile. You can look but if you try to push buttons, don't expect results!

NoClan.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Clans are optional groups of friends that enhance your online gaming experience. Coordinate with your clanmates to take on co-op challenges or just simply represent them in your solo play to earn extra rewards.

Join your friend's clan, meet some new friends, or create your own on the companion app or at [Bungie.net](https://bungie.net/).
NoClan.Name: ğŸ¦˜ No clan affiliation

Header.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Welcome to Braytech! Before you get started, I've got a handful of tips for you.

If you have feedback or questions, we can chat on Discord or you can check out the FAQ!
Header.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Getting Started

Search.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Need to find something quick? Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Press î»– or tap the magnifying glass button, and start typing!
Search.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Search

ğŸ¦˜ Braytech is jam-packed full of settings from dark themes to item visibility options to settings sync.

Find "Settings" in the top corner.

Views.Description: ğŸ¦˜ See all of Braytech's features at a glance by selecting **ïƒ** from the top of the app!

Landing.CallToAction: ğŸ¦˜ Explore Destiny through Braytech for sweet gains and insight into your fights against the forces of Darkness

Features.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Destiny 2 character progression, clans, triumphs, collections, and more. Braytech is a Destiny fan site that allows users to view and map checklists, track and view triumphs, inspect collectibles, and so much more.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press î»– and start typing! Braytech has a search interface, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa). Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech)!
Features.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Braytech

Support.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Braytech is a full-time jobâ€”I design and develop to improve myself and to aid all Guardians. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work and to make your Destiny experience even better. I hope you love using it as much as I love building it! ğŸ’–

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other patrons in the Braytech Research Division.
Support.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Are you a fan? Show your support

Landing.PollsChannel: ğŸ¦˜ Join the conversation on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and vote on how Braytech can improve.

Profile.Description: ğŸ¦˜ What gives you power; through light and dark, do you hold the frontlines as a Titan, disintegrate entire armies from afar as a Warlock, or move cowardly through the shadows as a Hunter?

Guardian.Description: ğŸ¦˜ What gives you power; through light and dark, do you hold the frontlines as a Titan, disintegrate entire armies from afar as a Warlock, or move slyly through the shadows as a Hunter?
Guardian.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Guardian

Activity.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ A Ghost's Guardian

Your life after your life begins here. You are a risen, chosen by a Ghost, and bestowed with great power through Light and Darkness.

These were your first steps.
Activity.Name: ğŸ¦˜ First Risen

Highlight.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Your pride and joy

You've elected to wear this accomplishment on your shoulder, for all around to see.
Highlight.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Highlight

Ranks.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Through boldness to the stars

Lead fireteams to victory against minions of the Darkness and compete against one another in the Crucible for accolades from Lord Shaxx himself.
Ranks.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Guardian Standing

Commonality.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Triumph and claim your rewards

Earth and worlds beyond touched by the Traveler hold wonderful oddities and sought-after treasures of myth.

The fun is in the chase.
Commonality.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Rare Treasures & Exotic Style

Seals.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Emblems of victory

The ultimate measure of a completionist and collector; wear them well.
Seals.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Sigilli

Fishing.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Catch of the day

Cast a weighted line, showcase your aquarium, and get competitive comparing your heftiest catches with your fellow anglers.
Fishing.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Competitive Fishing

AggregateActivityStats.Description:
ğŸ¦˜ Cumulative Experience

Sure, you've annihilated "gods," and in some cases, formed weapons from their remains, but just how many times have you thoughtlessly murdered them...
AggregateActivityStats.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Aggregate Activity Stats

PushNotifications.BraveBrowser: ğŸ¦˜ You appear to be using a silly browser, Brave: please ensure "Use Google services for push messaging" is enabled in your browser's settings.
PushNotifications.Incompatible: ğŸ¦˜ Your browser doesn't support push notifications yet.
PushNotifications.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Push notifications use browser and operating system APIs to send you notifications even when you're not using the app.

If you want Braytech to send you notifications, you can control if, when, and why, here.
PushNotifications.NoServiceWorker: ğŸ¦˜ A service worker hasn't been installed yet. Try reloading Braytech.

PushNotifications.ServiceWorkerInstalling: ğŸ¦˜ A service worker is installing. Please wait.

ReloadRequired.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Select reload app to activate your changes immediately.
ReloadRequired.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Reload Required

Reports.Info: ğŸ¦˜ Once downloaded, reports are saved to device storage for rapid access after the fact. All reports are associated with the member through which they were originally viewed. You can clear them here, member by member. You may wish to do this in order to minimise initial load time, if you've downloaded many reports.
Reports.NoReports: ğŸ¦˜ No reports are stored on this device.

HideFeatureSuggestions.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Hold your breathâ€“I know what I'm doing.
HideFeatureSuggestions.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Hide Feature Suggestions

ItemVisibilityOverride.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Use this setting to override global Item Visibility settings for records and collectibles.
ItemVisibilityOverride.Name: ğŸ¦˜ Show Completed and Acquired

Subscriptions.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but none of this is free or easy!

In place of ads, I depend on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables me to work on new features, and pays my rent!

Subscribe at one of the following tiers for cool rewards such as profile medals!
Subscriptions.Help: ğŸ¦˜ You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).

You can get help with this at any time by jumping on [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or by emailing [subscriptions@bray.tech](mailto:subscriptions@bray.tech).

Subscriptions.Blog: ğŸ¦˜ Keep track of Braytech's development by following along with the latest blog posts. I try to keep these as interesting and insightful as I can!
Subscriptions.Discord: ğŸ¦˜ Join the Braytech community! Hang out, drop suggestions, report bugs, and get help for the app instantly.

BraytechLegend.Updated: ğŸ¦˜ Your legend has been updated. âœ¨
BraytechLegend.Disabled: ğŸ¦˜ Your legend has been disabled.
BraytechLegend.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Brandish your profile with a unique username to make sharing easier, select a triumph or tracker to highlight when your profile is shared, and choose a character to default to when a link to your profile is shared without a character specified.

[Subscribers](/settings/subscriptions) get many benefits including the ability to grab a custom username.
BraytechLegend.AuthRequired: ğŸ¦˜ To alter your legend, you need to first authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net.
BraytechLegend.SubscriptionRequired: ğŸ¦˜ To claim a username and other cool tricks, you need to be a subscriber. [Support Braytech](/settings/subscriptions) through a subscription.
BraytechLegend.Username:
ğŸ¦˜ Select a unique username or fallback to your Bungie name. You can change this at any time.

A branding specialist is available upon request for a modest fee.
BraytechLegend.UsernameSpecifications: ğŸ¦˜ Maximum length for usernames is 127 characters. Any word character (equivalent to [a-zA-Z0-9_]) and some emoji are supported.
BraytechLegend.DefaultCharacter:
ğŸ¦˜ You can choose a character to be a default for links shared without a character identifier.

For example, if you share a link to https://bray.tech/@/{{username}}, Braytech will ask the viewer to select a character. You can select a preferred character instead.
BraytechLegend.ShareHighlight: ğŸ¦˜ When your profile is shared, an image specific to you is generated. You can choose to highlight a triumph or tracker you're proud of. This will also be displayed on the [Legend](/legend) view.

Auth.Description: ğŸ¦˜ Want to see your objectives and other progress data? Authenticate with Bungie.net and allow Braytech to securely read your profile data.

Subscriptions.Info:
ğŸ¦˜ Ads suck so Braytech doesn't use them, but building Braytech costs time.

In place of ads, Braytech depends on your generosity. Your support helps keep the app online, enables work on new features, and keeps the developer alive and housed!
Subscriptions.RewardSeraph: ğŸ¦˜ Unlock the **Seraph** medal, a symbol of dedication and commitment to protecting the Warmind and its assets, and bettering humankind.
Subscriptions.RewardSubmind: ğŸ¦˜ Submind tier patrons unlock this animated Warmind ultra medal.
Subscriptions.Rewards: ğŸ¦˜ Unlock unique profile medals when you subscribe to Braytech's Patreon.
Subscriptions.Leaderboards: ğŸ¦˜ Leaderboards are a lot of work, which while thought-provoking, is particularly costly. I had to buy Databases for Dummies and everything. If you like collecting things, maybe we could [interest you in unlocking some a rare medal](https://www.patreon.com/braytech) for your Braytech profile?
Subscriptions.MemberLinkExample:
ğŸ¦˜ This could be _you_, with a cool little medal on your member link to demonstrate your support for Braytech and its development.

_Braytech and its subsidiaries do not endorse the actions of Clovis Bray I or their variants._
